title: Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails
description: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the 'Export' dialog window. 2. Select both projects that were previously created. 3. Specify a name for the zip file (e.g., test.zip). 4. Start the export to zip file process.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, an error message box pops up. The error message indicates that there were problems during export, specifically with the file of the same name in project2.
EB: The export process should successfully create the zip file without encountering any errors.
SR: 1. Open the 'Export' dialog window. 2. Select multiple files with the same name under different directories. 3. Specify a name for the zip file. 4. Start the export to zip file process.
